snippet.title: Star Wars Battlefront: Co-Op Missions Gameplay Reveal | E3 2015 “Survival Mode” on Tatooine
snippet.description:
It's all about Survival, kid. In the *Star Wars*™ Battlefront™ Survival Missions you will take on waves of increasingly difficult Imperial forces – solo or with a Rebel friend by your side. Witness the intense gameplay of Survival in the deserts of Tatooine, and find out more information on Battlefront here: http://starwars.ea.com/starwars/battlefront


Subscribe to be the first to see more trailers and gameplay: http://bit.ly/1Ge7NQ1 
Pre-Order And Get Additional Bonus Content Early: http://smarturl.it/dqoe6f 

Star Wars Battlefront will be available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC
Release Date: November 17, 2015
